Class SimRunner

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Class for handling execution of a PhysiologySimulator.

      • hasExecuted

        public boolean hasExecuted()

      • compareDefaultInputs

        public void compareDefaultInputs()
        Sets the inputs to compare to the model default inputs. Necessary to prevent initial execution if the initial input parameters are within threshold ranges.

      • setInputs

        public boolean setInputs(long time)
        Sets up the model inputs for execution and determines if the simulation needs to run due to sufficient change in inputs.
        Parameters:
        time - synthea time
        Returns:
        true if inputs have sufficiently changed to warrant sim execution.

      • execute

        public void execute(long time)
        Executes the simulation if any input values are beyond the variance threshold.
        Parameters:
        time - simulation time
